short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps your crypto wallet safe by changing its paw color on trusted and scam websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blocki the Wallet WatchCat, powered by Persik PussyCat on TON chain, keeps your crypto wallet safe by changing its paw color in your browser's toolbar to let you know if your are on a trusted or possibly harmful crypto website. Its 4 colors are: green üü¢ (Trust List), orange üü† (warning), red üî¥ (Block List), and black ‚ö´Ô∏è (unknown security status). Clicking the paw shows helpful security and crypto information about the current website. Blocki works with Chromium-based browsers including: Chrome, Brave, Edge, Yandex, and Opera. The Firefox version will be available soon.

üîú The first DEX/memecoin charting tool will be available in Version 1.0.0!

üîí Never spies on which websites you visit. The Trust List and Block List are both automatically downloaded inside the extension every ~6 hours. In fact, Blocki's protection will work exactly the same if your internet is turned off.

‚≠êÔ∏è Premium WatchCat URLs are scanned daily for security issues and show a special star in the paw menu. Visit tryblocki.com/watchcat-websites to learn more, verify a WatchCat URL, or add your website to the WatchCat list.

üò∫ Persik PussyCat is the "Wallet WatchCat" mascot and powers Blocki with his PERSIK tokens (jettons) on TON chain. You can win prizes and unlock features by simply trying the extension & hodling PERSIK tokens (after Persik launches) or TON tokens (before Persik launches). Paste your TON chain wallet address into the settings page to automatically be entered into giveaways. Giveaway details: tryblocki.com/giveaways
